```{r}
data("pbmc3k")
counts <- pbmc3k@assays$RNA@counts

log1pPF_data <- NormalizeLog1pPF(counts)
PFlog1pPF_data <- NormalizePFLog1pPF(counts)

log1pPF_rev <- ReverseLogNorm(log1pPF_data)
```
